  • Method Details

    • attach

      void attach(Observer observer)
      Attach the BallObserver to the ball when it is being added.
      Parameters:
      observer - The ball observer that implements Observer.

    • alert

      void alert(Game game)
      This method is called when a ball falls into a pocket. This method updates the game score when a non-white ball falls into pocket.
      Parameters:
      game - The game instance.

    • getColour

      String getColour()
      Retrieve the colour of the ball.
      Returns:
      String The colour of the ball.
